title: Malphite is unplayable
body:
Ok so today i had a game playing as malphite and as the title says, he is unplayable.

The game was against a nasus who naturally wants to farm to oblivion so i had no problem last hitting.

But i did however have a problem with simply getting to the minions.

I dont know if its due to his player model size increase or the changes to the way minions move but the autopathing was my biggest enemy that game. I would right click on a minion expecting malph to gently stroll up and pummel it but instead i would get him walking back and forward behind an unpassable wall of minions. This was not just a one off but it happend multiple times. Some times even with 2 minions alone. it was like watching an alzheimers patient make breakfast.

Maybe its just me but i think it needs a bit of attention. Do you agree? Vote below and leave a message. Im up for some good yarns.

replies.body: its not just 1 champ its all ap and tank champs now and not just tanks
